pageContext.claim: “We saved a lot of lives [with the Serbia deal].”
pageContext.analysis: The first concerns Serbia’s non-recognition of Kosovo’s independence and Kosovo’s concomitant refusal to recognize Serbia. Trump’s agreement is a step toward normal relations between the two countries, but it fails to address two of the major sticking points in the conflict. Crisis Group outlines two key sets of issues, “The first concerns Serbia’s non-recognition of Kosovo’s independence and Kosovo’s concomitant refusal to recognize Serbia. The second concerns who will govern Serb-majority communities in Kosovo.“
